name: Tanisha
bio: I'm the owner for Luxe Salon. Haircare is my specialty but I love improving my nail, makeup, and skincare abilities.

name: Antony
bio: I love creating precise hair cuts, whether that's fades with an electric razer or blunt bobs with scissors.

name: Connor
bio: When you're done with your haircut, add an appointment with me to add some color! I love all types of color services- bright blondes, warm browns, vibrant reds, and all the out-there fashion colors you could ever want.

name: Kirsten
bio: Book with me for a cut and color! My specialty is creating dimensional blondes.

name: Lance
bio: My speciality is short hair cuts, undercuts, and fades.

name: Rowan
bio: Helping people feel comfortable in their skin is important to me.

name: Chanelle
bio: Skin care is my passion. I'd love to work with you long term to provide services and recommendations that are right for you!

name: Ana
bio: I value creating a calming, relaxing space for my clients to unwind and clear their minds.

name: Shelby
bio: My favorite part of my job is creating nail art!

name: Violet
bio: Whether you want a simple, one color manicure, or a complex set of detailed nails, I would love to work with you!

name: Jessi
bio: I love providing excellent customer service to our clients!
